= |blank_name = |blank_info = |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |website = |footnotes = }} Yonghe District（）is an urban area in northern Taiwan. Yonghe District is in the southern part of New Taipei City and it is the smallest district in New Taipei City. Yonghe is one of the most densely populated urban areas in the world. ==References== Category:Settlements_in_Taiwan
